title: Bloomberg Markets: Branson Says America `Abandoning Its Duty'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Branson Says America `Abandoning Its Duty'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Richard Branson Founder Virgin Group Discussing President Donald Trump announcing on Thursday that he will withdraw the U.S. from the Paris climate pact, saying it favors other nations at the expense of American workers, while vowing to pursue a better deal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
